titles.title: Commending the people and government of Kenya for the recent free elections and the orderly and democratic transfer of power.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on International Relations.

bill.summary: 1/7/2003--Introduced. Commends the people of Kenya and its newly elected president, members of parliament, and local councilors for their extraordinary commitment to the principles of free elections and a democratic form of government.Expresses full support for the new Kenyan government and urges patience on the part of the Kenyan people as the new government confronts the challenges that lay ahead.Urges the President to look with favor upon requests for assistance by the new Kenyan government as it moves forward to address the many concerns of the Kenyan people.
